channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JDK-8317335] Build on windows fails after 8316645
item.description:
The gtest build build start failing with
2023-10-01T16:43:00,815Z] c:\sb\prod\1696178381\workspace\open\test\hotspot\gtest\runtime\test_atomic.cpp(154): error C2220: the following warning is treated as an error
[2023-10-01T16:43:00,815Z] c:\sb\prod\1696178381\workspace\open\test\hotspot\gtest\runtime\test_atomic.cpp(154): warning C4309: 'initializing': truncation of constant value
[2023-10-01T16:43:00,831Z] lib/CompileGtest.gmk:94: recipe for target '/cygdrive/c/sb/prod/1696178381/workspace/build/windows-x64/hotspot/variant-server/libjvm/gtest/objs/static/test_atomic.obj' failed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u/pull/325
Date: 2023-11-06 14:08:29 +0000

[jdk21u-fix-request] Approval Request from Aleksey Shipilëv
8317335 Clean backport on the way to improve Atomic support in 21u. A series of two commits, the last one fixes a trivial build error.
Sorry, my bad! Thanks for fixing!

Changeset: 93f662f4
Author: Kim Barrett <kbarrett@openjdk.org>
Date: 2023-10-01 20:01:09 +0000
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/commit/93f662f4fc766c09492c8d4ce7048605325d2100

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/pull/16000
Date: 2023-10-01 19:45:49 +0000
The problem is that the initial value for `_default_val` is 0xaa, which is out of range for a signed 8bit `char`.
